author: Bloomberg
title: Trump's Covid 'gamechanger' hydroxychloroquine turns life-changer for an obscure Indian plantation
description: Trump vowed in March to make the affordable medication widely available to fight the pandemic, which has sickened about 2 million people globally, killed more than 126,000, and has no approved cure or vaccine. In India, the government has recommended hydroxyc…
content:
By Pradipta Mukherjee and Bhuma ShrivastavaU.S. President Donald Trump’s backing for a malaria drug to treat Covid-19 has boosted the prospects of an obscure plantation in the mountains of eastern India.
About 6,900 acres (28 kilometers) of the lower Himalay… [+3667 chars]
